commits.message: Fix der Authentifizierung bei abgelaufenem JWT-Token
Update README with new deployment instructions
Fehler bei Login behoben wenn Sonderzeichen im Passwort
Add Pagination-Support fuer die Benutzerliste im Admin-Panel

summary.notes: Model should produce a coherent English summary even though input messages are in mixed languages. Auth fix and login fix are most important.

json.notes: Model must correctly interpret German and mixed-language messages and categorize them appropriately.
